name: Five Nights With The Boys (THE FULL-ASS DEMO v2.0)

description:
MAKE SURE TO HIT FULL SCREEN BUTTON SO GAME IS PROPERLY SHOWN

===========================================================

THIS IS JUST A DEMO. EVERYTHING IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE IN THE FULL VERSION.

THE DEMO HAS ONLY NIGHTS 1-5. EXTRAS CONTENT WILL BE AVAILABLE IN

THE FULL GAME.

===========================================================

no keyboard controls. everything is done with the mouse. you will learn how to play as you play the game.
